title: start_funkit_secure
body:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -Eeuo pipefail
export PIKIT_OPENAI_BASE_URL="http://localhost:8081/v1"
export PIKIT_OPENAI_API_KEY="funkit-local"
export PIKIT_MODEL_NAME="mistral-7b-instruct"
export PIKIT_MAX_TOKENS_DEFAULT=256
export PIKIT_REQUEST_TIMEOUT=600
export PIKIT_DEBUG=1

# Show what the adapter sees
python3 - <<'PY'
import os, sys, json
sys.path.insert(0, os.path.abspath('modules'))
from ai_interface import AIInterface
ai = AIInterface()
print(">>> ADAPTER CONFIG", json.dumps(ai.get_config(), indent=2))
PY

exec python3 main.py
